blogPost.excerpt: Reslash is the most fun way to get together online. Recreate the feel of a Christmas party, virtually. Break away from the stress of zoom calls or the hassle of breakout rooms. It's time to celebrate and have fun this holiday season with Reslash!
blogPost.body: Reslash is the most fun way to get together online. Recreate the feel of a Christmas party, virtually. Break away from the stress of zoom calls or the hassle of breakout rooms. It's time to celebrate and have fun this holiday season with Reslash!
blogPost.title: Reslash for Christmas - Host the best virtual Christmas party ever
blogPost.author: Ashwin Gupta

localize.description: Reslash是在线聚会最有趣的方式。虚拟地重现圣诞派对的感觉。摆脱变焦电话的压力或分组房间的麻烦。现在是与Reslash一起庆祝和享受这个节日季节的时候了！
localize.tagline: 举办有史以来最棒的虚拟圣诞派对

localize.description: Reslash是在線聚會最有趣的方式。虛擬地重現聖誕派對的感覺。擺脫變焦電話的壓力或分組房間的麻煩。現在是與Reslash一起慶祝和享受這個節日季節的時候了！
localize.tagline: 舉辦有史以來最棒的虛擬聖誕派對

previous.excerpt: Honk is the new way to chat with your friends in real-time, with messages shown live as you type! Fast, fun, private. Speak your mind and be yourself—it's a whole new way to chat.
previous.title: Honk - Real-time messaging

localize.description: 喇叭是一种与朋友实时聊天的新方式，当你打字时，消息会实时显示！快，有趣，私密。畅所欲言，做你自己--这是一种全新的聊天方式。
喇叭是一種與朋友實時聊天的新方式，當你打字時，消息會實時顯示！快，有趣，私密。暢所欲言，做你自己--這是一種全新的聊天方式。

next.excerpt: Connect with your loved ones and create lasting memories, with video messages from Canva. There’s always an occasion to celebrate, create customized video messages by yourself or with a group and make every moment special.
next.title: Video Messages from Canva - Celebrate any occasion with a group video message.

localize.description: 通过Canva提供的视频信息，与您所爱的人保持联系，创造永恒的回忆。总会有庆祝的机会，自己或和团队一起制作定制的视频信息，让每一个时刻都变得特别。
localize.tagline: 用一条集体视频信息来庆祝任何场合。

localize.description: 通過Canva提供的視頻信息，與您所愛的人保持聯繫，創造永恆的回憶。總會有慶祝的機會，自己或和團隊一起製作定製的視頻信息，讓每一個時刻都變得特別。
localize.tagline: 用一條集體視頻信息來慶祝任何場合。
